title: Radiant Diamond Gold Bangles - 'Gajulu' Set for Every Occasion
features: Elegant and contemporary design. The bangles feature a slim, sleek profile, perfect for daily wear or stacking. Each bangle is set with a row of brilliantly cut diamonds. The design features evenly spaced diamond settings along the bangle, adding a touch of sparkle. A secure and comfortable clasp ensures easy wear and removal.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold and sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: weddings. Suitable as a thoughtful gift for birthdays
description: This Diamond Gold Bangle set offers a modern take on a traditional accessory. The slim design is versatile for all attires. The diamonds provide a brilliant sparkle and ensure long-lasting beauty. Each bangle is crafted with the highest quality materials and workmanship.
